about.title: Who We Are
about.description: Pies Contentos is a non-profit organization founded in Chihuahua, Mexico. Our main objective is to provide support to children between 6 and 12 years of age who are in a vulnerable situation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: Our mission is to empower communities through education, access to vital resources, and the promotion of a sustainable future. We believe in the potential of every individual to create positive and lasting change.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: We are deeply grateful to these organizations for their invaluable support and collaboration in our mission.

volunteers.title: Your Time, Their Future
volunteers.subtitle: Volunteers are the heart of our organization. Every hour you dedicate helps us create a real and lasting impact in a child's life.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions, want to volunteer, or just say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
